## Location

```{r,eval=TRUE,include=FALSE}
library(yaml)
library(readxl)
library(leaflet)

# set location in _site.yml
loc <- yaml::read_yaml("_site.yml")$location
dfr <- readxl::read_xlsx("info.xlsx")
dfr <- dfr[dfr$location==loc,]
```

```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,chunk.title=NULL}
if(loc!="online") {
  dfr$address <- gsub(",","<br>",dfr$address)
  icons <- awesomeIcons(icon=dfr$marker_icon, markerColor=dfr$marker_colour, iconColor="#FFFFFF", library="fa")
  
  leaflet(height=450,width="auto") %>%
    addTiles(urlTemplate='http://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png') %>%
    addAwesomeMarkers(lat=dfr$lat, lng=dfr$lon, label=dfr$label, popup=dfr$address, icon=icons) %>%
    setView(lat=dfr$lat[1], lng=dfr$lon[1], zoom=15)
}
```

```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis",chunk.title=NULL}
cat("## Practical information")
cat("\n",dfr$description[1])
```
